p: The antifungal, antibacterial, antioxidant, and antitumoral activity exhibited by TEO and SEO have been demonstrated, but there are only few data concerning the synergism or antagonism of these EOs used together in different research areas. It seems that the use of mixed EOs is very beneficial in the field of medicine [ 31]. Also, to our best knowledge, there are limited studies on allelopathic effects of SEO and TEO.
